content.rendered:
SIGN UP

The card number that you enter to pay for the installation fee will be used to set up automatic monthly payments for service. Your card will  be charged for the install fee, and first month after you are installed. Since service is month-to-month, you pay each month for your upcoming month of service and will receive an emailed receipt. Please call us at 970-340-8100 to change your card number or for any billing questions.
